manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_longbing_card_articles` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题', `cover` varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''
